Name Description Effects Mysterious Artefact It's engraved with pulsating runes. Something stirs within. Story item on Shadowheart. Elaborate Key A beautifully wrought golden key, plucked from a bloody corpse. Elaborate Key opens the Elaborate Reliquary next to Shadow Heart and the Mind Flyer Pods in the Nautiloid.
